headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Finished Thursday
headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Finished Thursday

docs.snippet: After a quiet start, major U.S. stock indexes again set all-time highs Thursday afternoon as the market built on a surge the previous day. Banks continued to lead the way as bond yields jumped, and small-company stocks soared again....
docs.lead_paragraph: After a quiet start, major U.S. stock indexes again set all-time highs Thursday afternoon as the market built on a surge the previous day. Banks continued to lead the way as bond yields jumped, and small-company stocks soared again.

headline.main: ISIS Remains Threat in Libya Despite Defeat in Surt, U.S. Officials Say
headline.print_headline: ISIS Remains Threat in Libya Despite Surt Defeat, U.S. Officials Say

docs.snippet: Officials say surviving fighters could go underground and exploit the economic and political vacuum, threatening not only the country but also its neighbors and possibly Europe....

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from Cairo.

docs.lead_paragraph: Officials say surviving fighters could go underground and exploit the economic and political vacuum, threatening not only the country but also its neighbors and possibly Europe.

headline.main: Factbox: Trump Fills Top Jobs for His Administration
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Trump Fills Top Jobs for His Administration

docs.snippet: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump plans to nominate Andrew Puzder, chief executive of fast-food chain operator CKE Restaurants Inc, as his choice for labor secretary, a source familiar with the matter said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump plans to nominate Andrew Puzder, chief executive of fast-food chain operator CKE Restaurants Inc, as his choice for labor secretary, a source familiar with the matter said on Thursday.

headline.main: BNY Mellon's Payment Woes Its Second Big Tech Glitch in 18 Months
headline.print_headline: BNY Mellon's Payment Woes Its Second Big Tech Glitch in 18 Months

docs.snippet: A payment processing glitch at BNY Mellon Corp this week should not be a surprise as executives inside the world's largest custody bank recently highlighted a number of problems with the daily task of moving trillions of dollars around the global ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A payment processing glitch at BNY Mellon Corp this week should not be a surprise as executives inside the world's largest custody bank recently highlighted a number of problems with the daily task of moving trillions of dollars around the global banking system.

headline.main: Brazil's Temer to Call Trump as Country Seeks Business Openings
headline.print_headline: Brazil's Temer to Call Trump as Country Seeks Business Openings

docs.snippet: Brazilian President Michel Temer plans to call U.S. President-elect Donald Trump next week as Brazil looks for business opportunities that could open up if Trump follows through on campaign promises to rewrite a trade deal with Mexico....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian President Michel Temer plans to call U.S. President-elect Donald Trump next week as Brazil looks for business opportunities that could open up if Trump follows through on campaign promises to rewrite a trade deal with Mexico.

headline.main: Review: A Trip to Hell, via the VCR, in ‘Beyond the Gates’

docs.snippet: In this horror movie, two brothers play an old-school board game with a videotape and run into Barbara Crampton of “Re-Animator.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: In this horror movie, two brothers play an old-school board game with a videotape and run into Barbara Crampton of “Re-Animator.”

headline.main: 'Godspeed, John Glenn': Public Hails Hero of Space, Politics
headline.print_headline: 'Godspeed, John Glenn': Public Hails Hero of Space, Politics

docs.snippet: Tributes poured in for former astronaut and U.S. Sen. John Glenn, who died Thursday at age 95. Politicians, astronauts, educators and others called him a hero, with many mentioning the phrase that first sent him into orbit: "Godspeed, John Glenn."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tributes poured in for former astronaut and U.S. Sen. John Glenn, who died Thursday at age 95. Politicians, astronauts, educators and others called him a hero, with many mentioning the phrase that first sent him into orbit: "Godspeed, John Glenn."
